name: Deep Learning
description: Fundamentals of neural networks and advanced deep learning techniques.

chapters.name: Intro to Deep Learning
chapters.description: This chapter covers Intro to Deep Learning.

quizzes.title: Intro to Deep Learning Quiz 1
quizzes.remarks: A quiz on Intro to Deep Learning

questions.question_statement: What is deep learning primarily used for?
Which library is commonly used for deep learning in Python?
Deep learning is a subset of which broader field?
Which type of data is deep learning particularly good at processing?
Which of the following is a key characteristic of deep learning models?
Neural networks were inspired by which biological structure?
Deep learning models require large amounts of what?
Which of the following activation functions is most commonly used in hidden layers?
Overfitting in deep learning is typically reduced using?
Epoch in deep learning refers to?
options: One pass of the full dataset through the model

quizzes.title: Neural Networks Quiz 1
quizzes.remarks: A quiz on Neural Networks

questions.question_statement: Which component applies weights to inputs in a neural network?
What is the role of the bias term in a neural network?
options: To allow flexibility in shifting activation

questions.question_statement: Backpropagation is used to?
Which layer connects input directly to output in a neural network?
What type of function is Softmax?
Which component applies weights to inputs in a neural network?
What is the role of the bias term in a neural network?
options: To allow flexibility in shifting activation

questions.question_statement: Backpropagation is used to?
